snippet: The acquisition, which is expected to close by July, will help Toshiba to expand into the fast-growing consumer markets of developing countries, the companies said in a joint statement.
abstract: The acquisition, which is expected to close by July, will help Toshiba to expand into the fast-growing consumer markets of developing countries, the companies said in a joint statement.

headline.main: Toshiba to Buy I.B.M.'s Retail Sales Unit for $850 Million
